relationships.description: Carolyn Rangel is President of Deepak Chopra LLC
Deepak Chopra is associated with The Chopra Foundation

analysis.purpose: Weekly update promoting meditation events and sharing political commentary articles
analysis.significance: Shows connection between wellness promotion and political commentary in Chopra organization communications

notable_quotes: A survey of 117 historians recently ranked Donald Trump the worst President in history, which seems right after only one year in office.

Trumpism is the product of collective consciousness, and although one hears about 'the wisdom of crowds,' but when collective consciousness veers as close to lunacy as this administration, healing is the only answer.
If as we often hear, America isn't a place on the map but an idea, the idea is in trouble.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this promotional email with political commentary

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a promotional email about meditation events with political commentary

details: Archive of Deepak's articles published by San Francisco Chronicle

public_knowledge.context: Content includes public political commentary and promotional material for public meditation events that would typically be shared publicly

analysis.summary: This is a weekly update email from Carolyn Rangel of Deepak Chopra LLC promoting meditation events featuring Deepak Chopra and Oprah, while also including political commentary criticizing the Trump administration and discussing the need for healing in American society.
